name: Droll Yankees, Inc. LF-4 4 Port Hummingbird Feeder-4 PORT HUMMINGBRD SAUCER
categoryPath: Patio & Garden/Patio & Outdoor Decor/Bird Baths & Feeders

reviews.name: Droll Yankees Little Flyer 4 Hummingbird Feeder
reviews.reviewText:
This is a great hummingbird feeder. Exactly as described. Doesn't leak & ant proof. After not having a feeder for almost 6 months (old style - leaked) we put this out on New Year's Eve in the later afternoon. Had hummingbirds the next morning.

One more thing...this was a last minute Christmas gift. Ordered online from Walmart on Dec 18. It shipped THAT day and arrived on Dec 20. Thank you Walmart!
reviews.title: Hummingbirds are in heaven!

reviews.name: Droll Yankees Little Flyer 4 Hummingbird Feeder
reviews.reviewText: Droll Yankee makes the best feeders on earth. The birds enjoy them the most. I have been feeding birds for 50 years and have had plenty of experience with feeders.
reviews.title: The Best!

reviews.name: Droll Yankees Little Flyer 4 Hummingbird Feeder
reviews.reviewText: After 5 different feeders this one has solved our problem of attracting bees instead of hummingbirds.
reviews.title: No bees
